typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		activate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadActivationDataset
ReadActivationDataset derive(dataset_column = 1) ~> AddActivationColumn
AddActivationColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		activate as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Activate_1_AssetPortfolio_Runtime1'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteActivationFile
